state_description: This screen allows users to perform an in-depth checkup of their Mac for vulnerabilities and malware. It provides options to remove malicious files, protect the Mac, and perform a deep scan tailored to user preferences.

enables.name: Configure
enables.description: Opens settings to tailor the Moonlock Engine's scanning performance and capabilities.

enables.name: Scan
enables.description: Initiates a malware scan to detect and remove threats from the Mac.
